description: Complete About Me page overhaul for Jacob Darling's portfolio site
instructions: Redesign the About Me page to be scannable, visually engaging, and conversion-focused.
Highlight credibility signals (Quick Wins, metrics, career highlights) in visual formats instead of long paragraphs.
Balance professional expertise with personal philosophy to build trust and connection.
Ensure responsive design across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Integrate subtle animations (fade-in, counters, scroll-triggered reveals) while respecting prefers-reduced-motion.
Provide keyboard-accessible carousel controls and ARIA roles for testimonials.

hero.headline: I build marketing systems that turn complexity into clarity.
hero.subheadline: 15+ years connecting content, automation, and analytics to drive measurable growth.

story.why: I believe systems create freedom. My work empowers teams with clarity and reproducibility.

entries.highlight: Scaled platform to 30K+ users with GPT-powered support assistant

testimonials.layout: Carousel with keyboard controls and reduced-motion support
quotes: Jacob turned chaos into a scalable system that just works.
Our support load dropped dramatically after his automation rollout.

components.HeroAbout: Framer Motion fade-in for headline and subheadline
components.CareerTimeline: Framer Motion whileInView for scroll-triggered fade/slide
components.TestimonialsCarousel: Embla carousel with keyboard controls and prefers-reduced-motion support
components.CTASection: Bold button linking to case studies and résumé

buildSteps.label: Add Embla styles
Wire About page
actions: Assemble layout in order: HeroAbout → QuickWins → StorySection → CareerTimeline → TestimonialsCarousel → CTASection

buildSteps.label: Accessibility checks
instructions: Carousel has keyboard navigation and ARIA roles
Respect prefers-reduced-motion for autoplay and animations

buildSteps.label: Performance checks
instructions: Use themeMotion config for consistent durations/easing

buildSteps.label: Commit changes
buildSteps.run: git add -A && git commit -m "feat: about page overhaul with animations + accessibility" && git push

successCriteria: Hero headline and subheadline fade in smoothly
Quick Wins counters animate once on load
Career timeline entries animate on scroll
Testimonials carousel is keyboard accessible and respects reduced-motion
CTA buttons are prominent and responsive
Responsive audit passes with no critical issues
